A sequel to "The Girl who couldant with Birds" where the protagonist discovers she can communicate with other animals as well, leading her on a journey of self-discovery and adventure.
A spin-off series featuring the protagonist's adventures as she uses her unique ability to solve mysteries and crimes involving animals.
A retelling of the original story from the perspective of the birds, revealing the protagonist's life from their point of view.
A graphic novel adaptation of the original story, featuring illustrations of the protagonist's interactions with birds and the lush natural world around her.
A stage play adaptation of the original story, featuring a live performance of the protagonist's conversations with birds and the challenges she faces in using her ability.
